## Block.setListOfValues() method

Bind LOV to field(s)

**Signature:**

```typescript
setListOfValues(lov: ListOfValues, field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lov | [ListOfValues](./forms42core.listofvalues.md) | The List of Values (LOV) to bind. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The name of the field or an array of field names to bind the LOV to. |

**Returns:**

void
